com.cboe.interfaces.domain.product
Interface ProductComponent

public interface ProductComponent

A part of a composite product. Strategies are the only currently planned use, but a component could also be part of an index.

Method Summary
 void create(Product composite, Product component, double quantity, char side)
          Creates an initialized instance.
 Product getComponent()
          Gets component product.
 Product getComposite()
          Get composite product.
 boolean matchesLeg(StrategyLegStruct leg, boolean reverseSides)
          Tests to values in leg against values in this component.
 StrategyLegStruct toLegStruct()
          Converts component to a strategy leg struct.
 

Method Detail

create

void create(Product composite,
            Product component,
            double quantity,
            char side)
Creates an initialized instance.

Parameters:
composite - parent of the component
component - product used as a component of this composite
quantity - amount of component used in the composite
side - how component will be traded in composite

getComponent

Product getComponent()
Gets component product.

getComposite

Product getComposite()
Get composite product.

matchesLeg

boolean matchesLeg(StrategyLegStruct leg,
                   boolean reverseSides)
Tests to values in leg against values in this component.

Parameters:
leg - strategy leg to be tested
reverseSides - if true, sides must be opposite
Returns:
true if leg matches this component

toLegStruct

StrategyLegStruct toLegStruct()
Converts component to a strategy leg struct.
